markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Yeast Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1929)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wild yeast and alchemy combine to form this monstrous frothing ooze.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ooze_YeastOoze.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Yeast Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1929)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Ooze" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=122" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 88</row>

**Perception** +6; motion sense 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** -2

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** -1

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Motion Sense** A yeast ooze can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 12 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 60

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), critical hits, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)

**Resistances**
slashing 5, piercing 5

**Weaknesses**
bludgeoning 5, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pseudopod +9,
**Damage** 1d8+3 bludgeoning plus monstrous yeast

**Monstrous Yeast**  ([Contact](/Traits.aspx?ID=37), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) Whenever a creature infected with monstrous yeast takes cold damage, they can make a new saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus. Failure doesn't advance the disease; **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Stage 1** [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 hour); **Stage 2** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) and flat-footed (1 hour); **Stage 3** enfeebled 2 and flat-footed (1 day)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-79" />
name: Yeast Ooze
